identity.name: Verityflow
identity.mission: Detect scams, fake news, and phishing with clinical precision and human clarity.

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings to establish a modern, tech-forward corporate identity. Use Public Sans for body text for maximum legibility (government-grade clarity). Use JetBrains Mono for technical details like URLs, confidence scores, or raw message snippets.

usage_rules: Background should be 'bg-slate-50' (warm grey) to reduce eye strain, not pure white.
Cards should be 'bg-white' with subtle borders.
Primary Blue (#1e40af) is for the 'Analyze' button and active states.
NEVER use gradients for text. Keep text high-contrast solid colors.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Results)

containers.card: rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-900 text-white rounded-lg px-8 py-4 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-blue-900/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg px-6 py-3 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.textarea: w-full min-h-[200px] rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white p-6 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all resize-none shadow-inner
inputs.search: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 px-4 focus:bg-white transition-colors

cards.stat: p-6 rounded-xl bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm flex flex-col gap-2

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

hero_bg.alt: Abstract blue curves representing secure data flow
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with low opacity (opacity-40) and mix-blend-multiply

texture_bg.usage: Footer background or technical section background, grayscale, low contrast

audience_context.usage: Use in 'Who is this for' or 'Protect your loved ones' section

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use slate-600+ for text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-live for the verdict result region.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or headers.
Ensure mobile responsiveness (stack grids on mobile).
Use 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class conditional logic.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Home/Analyzer' page first. Focus on the 'Input -> Analyze -> Result' flow. The Result card must be the centerpiece, using the Bento Grid layout to separate Verdict, Confidence, and Explanations. Use the 'hero_bg' image as a subtle backdrop for the main analyzer container to give it depth.
